refnamediv.refpurpose: a lightweight GTK3-based panel for the LXDE desktop.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the simple-panel command.
simple-panel is a program that provides a panel for the desktop, usually for LXDE. It is a lightweight GTK+ 3.x based desktop panel.

listitem.para: User-friendly application menu automatically generated from .desktop files on the system.
Launcher bar (small icons clicked to launch apps)
Task bar supporting ICCCM/EWMH `urgency' hint (Pidgin IM windows can flash on new incoming messages)
Run dialog (type command to run, without opening a terminal )

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: This program follows the usual GNU command line syntax, with long options starting with two dashes (`-'). A summary of options is included below.

listitem.para: Set the logging level in the range 0 (silent) through 5 (verbose).
Set the profile to be loaded.
config file, can be edited by preference dialog.
